item.title: [PI]Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @L2_e_c_o_i_l L2 e c o i l
item.description:
@L2_e_c_o_i_l wrote:

i am currently working on castlewars for priject insanity base but i have ran into a small dilemma.

i need to make it so it wont let you wear capes and helms when teleporting into the lobby and make u put on the correct cape and hood for the team upon entrance and take them off upon exit. all i need is the method it should look something like this

public void removeHood(Client c) { for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { if (c.playerItems[i] == HOOD ID) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.playerItems[i], 1, c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.playerItems[i])); } } }
for removing the hood i just need help with someone a little more experienced with [PI] then me.

please help would be appreciated.

EDIT: fixed code

Read full topic
